snippet.title: Pyre - PlayStation Experience 2016: Versus Mode Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/pyre-ps4/

In the next game from the creators of Bastion and Transistor, experience both the rich single-player campaign, or challenge a friend to an action-packed showdown in the new head-to-head Versus Mode.

More at: http://www.supergiantgames.com | @SupergiantGames

Song: "Path to Glory (Trailer Edit)", from the Pyre Original Soundtrack. Written by Darren Korb.

http://www.supergiantgames.com/
